options.help: Train (fit) a classification model on the data in the data_path directory.
Evaluate a classification model on the data in the data_path directory. Requires either --train or --load-path must be specified.
Specify the architecture to use to train a model from scratch. Defaults to "inception_resnet_v2". Cannot coexist with --load_path.
Perform prediction (inference) using a classification model on the data in the data_path directory. Either --train or --load-path must be specified.
Increase the verbosity of keras. May be specified multiple times.
The dimensions (x, y) to resize images to. Defaults to (224, 224)
The maximum number of epochs to run training for. Ignored if --train is not specified.
The path to which to save the trained model. Requires --train to be specified.
The path from which to load a model. Cannot coexist with --architecture.
